titleStmt.title: A treatise of conversion Preached, and now published for the use of those that are strangers to a true conversion, especially the grosly ignorant and ungodly. By Richard Baxter, teacher of the Church of Christ at Kederminster.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.W. for Nevil Simmons bookseller in Kiderminster, and are to be sold by Joseph Nevil, at the Plough in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
